DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize topical anti-inflammatory treatment could counteract inflammatory reaction induce EGFR'Is .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Preventive Therapy With Oint Threolone , Synthomycine Aqua Cream Lotion , EGFR ' I Induced Acneiform Rash
DOC.criteria: Patients plan initiate treatment either cetuximab , erlotinib , gefitinib panitumumab . Patients receive facial topical treatment / systemic antibiotic antiinflammatory drug 2 week prior study initiation . Known hypersensitivity ointment Synthomycine Threolone . Patients present cutaneous rash 2 week prior study initiation
